title: S8E05 – "Quick Bites" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you ten spine-chilling tales from author Tobias Wade, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about demonic revenge, unsettling secrets, splintering worlds, self-help insanity, funereal flora, saintly sinners, draconic dogs, terrible towns, and stories best told in the dark.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
